channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Major political upset in Texas after Democrats win special elections
item.description: Two Democrats won key races in Texas, narrowing the Republican majority in Congress. CBS News' Fin Gomez has more.

item.title: Grammys 2026: See the winners list
item.description: Here are the winners of the 2026 Grammys.

item.title: WATCH: This one-man band takes to the streets and takes requests
item.description: ABC News' Danny New talks to a young New Yorker who's gaining fame for bringing his tunes to the streets and inviting bystanders to jam with him.

item.title: Funding fight turns to the House as lawmakers look to avoid lengthy shutdown
item.description: The House is returning to Washington on Monday, where GOP leaders are aiming to move swiftly to approve the funding package.

item.title: 'Today' show host Savannah Guthrie's mother reported missing in Arizona: Sheriff
item.description: An 84-year-old woman who was reported missing in Arizona has been identified by officials as the mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie.

item.title: WATCH: Top moments from the Grammy Awards
item.description: Going into the 2026 Grammys, Kendrick Lamar, Lady Gaga and Bad Bunny led the list of nominees.

item.title: Man sentenced to 4 years in prison for throwing Molotov cocktail during LA immigration protest
5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and father return to Minnesota from ICE facility in Texas
item.description: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have returned to Minnesota after being released by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

item.title: Mayor of Portland, Oregon, demands ICE leave the city after federal agents gas protesters
